Html:
When I right click on an axis (VerticalAxis or HorizontalAxis), the axis goes into scale mode, where mouse movements stretch/shrink the range displayed on the Axis.

No matter where I click or what I do, this continues... I dont think this is the expected behaviour.

 

Note: I am using the latest source (28519) but it was present in previous two versions (28332 and 28208).

Hi!

Will be fixed in next changeset - there will be a little bit strange behaviour of ContextMenu on axes, but everything else seems to be OK.

Mikhail.

Hi,

Fixed in 'Nightly' in changeset 28547.

Best regards,

Mikhail.
